title: COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 1421/93 of 7 June 1993 temporarily suspending the autonomous Common Customs Tariff duties on a number of agricultural products
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 1421/93 of 7 June 1993 temporarily suspending the autonomous Common Customs Tariff duties on a number of agricultural products
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The autonomous Common Customs Tariff duties for the products listed in the table appearing in the Annex shall be suspended at the level indicated in respect of each of them.
These suspensions shall apply from 1 July 1993 to 30 June 1994.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 7 June 1993.
For the Council
The President
M. JELVED
ANNEX
/* Tables: see OJ */
